import typography from'assets/theme/base/typography';import borders from'assets/theme/base/borders';// Material Dashboard 2 React Helper Functions
import pxToRem from'assets/theme/functions/pxToRem';var fontWeightBold=typography.fontWeightBold,size=typography.size;var borderRadius=borders.borderRadius;var root={display:'inline-flex',justifyContent:'center',alignItems:'center',fontSize:size.xs,fontWeight:fontWeightBold,borderRadius:borderRadius.lg,padding:"".concat(pxToRem(6.302)," ").concat(pxToRem(16.604)),lineHeight:1.4,textAlign:'center',textTransform:'uppercase',userSelect:'none',backgroundSize:'150% !important',backgroundPositionX:'25% !important',transition:'all 150ms ease-in','&:disabled':{pointerEvent:'none',opacity:0.65},'& .material-icons':{fontSize:pxToRem(15),marginTop:pxToRem(-2)}};export default root;
